ActorTalk: Hmm... oh, it's you, [PlayerName]! Care for a drink? The first one's on me.
You've got enough to deal with already. You should be relaxing when you come here, not worrying about me.
Oh! Want to try my special ginger soda? Caffeine-free.
(He looks really troubled... I should ask the staff what's going on.)
Is there anything I can help with?
You look like you haven't slept in days.
It's alright, I'll leave you to your work for now.
